ProteinName	Synaptojanin-1 (EC 3.1.3.36) (Synaptic inositol 1,4,5-trisphosphate 5-phosphatase 1)
GeneName	SYNJ1 KIAA0910
Length	1295
Function	Phosphatase that acts on various phosphoinositides, including phosphatidylinositol 4-phosphate, phosphatidylinositol (4,5)-bisphosphate and phosphatidylinositol (3,4,5)-trisphosphate (PubMed:23804563, PubMed:27435091). Has a role in clathrin-mediated endocytosis (By similarity). Hydrolyzes PIP2 bound to actin regulatory proteins resulting in the rearrangement of actin filaments downstream of tyrosine kinase and ASH/GRB2 (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Perinuclear region
